name: CAT PONG (Kurtis.Palmer)
description:
Pong game features and resources

By Kurtis Palmer

Cat pong is two players. One control paddle with W and S keys, and Player 2 uses arrow keys.

Resources Used:

  • Background music : 8Bit Music- 062022, by gWriterStudio. Assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/8bit-music-062022-225623
  • Cat Assets,
  • https://www.freeiconpng.com/downloading/40349
  • https://www.freeiconpng.com/img/40367
  • https://www.freeiconpng.com/img/40368
  • https://www.pinterest.com.au/pin/921619511216538447
  • https://www.pngitem.com/middle/hwiTwhR_cat-paw-google-phone-cat-paw-transparent-background/

Features:

  • The ball resets when it goes offscreen (however, it maintains its speed and direction).
  • The paddles do not leave the screen.
  • Player score UI
  • Ball increases speed over time (however I have noticed that it is inconsistent and only works sometimes).
  • Background music.
  • Explosion effect when a player scores.
  • Cats.
